Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Associate Editor, Review of Economics and Institutions

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: European Financial Management Association, Conference Program Committee Member

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Visiting Position: University of California San Diego, CA.
Visiting Position: Universidad Torcuato Di Tella, Buenos Aires, Argentina.
Visiting Position: University of Western Australia, Perth, Australia,
Visiting Position: The Reserve Bank of New Zealand, Wellington, NZ.
Visiting Position: Macquarie University, Sydney, Australia.
Visiting Position: Massey University, Auckland, NZ.
Visiting Position: International Monetary Fund, Washington
Visiting Position: Zayed University, Abu Dhabi and Dubai, United Arab Emirates.
Visiting Position: University Parthenope, Naples, Italy.
Visiting Position: University of Western Ontario, Toronto, Canada

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Research Fellow, Centre for the Analysis of Risk and Optimisation Modelling Applications, Brunel University London
Research Fellow, Centre for Empirical Finance, Brunel University London
Research Associate, Centre for Applied Macroeconomic Analysis, CAMA, Australian National University, Australia
Research Associate, Center of Financial Investigation, Universita Torquato di Tella, Buenos Aires, Argentina

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: PhD External Examiner: University of Birmingham

Taught Programme External Examiner: Post Graduate Diploma in Finance, Birkbeck College, University of London; Taught Programme External Examiner: Post Graduate Diploma in Financial Engineering, Birkbeck College, University of London
